messages.messageBody:
I don't know if you have already visited this site about Itou and Gryoueji.
http://bakumatu.727.net/index2.htm
You can find many info about them including Itou's appearence.
http://bakumatu.727.net/kanbu/ik-index.htm
http://bakumatu.727.net/kanbu/ik-data.htm

I tried to post it on SHQ message board at Itou affair thread, but curiously
they requiered registeration to posting though I've already done it, and as my
e-mail adersse is taken by me I can't register with my account. It's strange,
because I could log in to the chat last night.
I'll see closely the problem later.

Just one things about a subject of the last chat.
I wonder if Soji's flatfish like face fact chocked many of yours...
I remembered after chat that in "Kaze Hikaru"manga , Itou said about Soji
that he wasn't interested in someone like "Dark flatfish".
And even Sei (the heroine) treat him as "Dark Flatfish", so Kaze Hikaru Souji
is considered like this I think, if he hasn't such a kind of appearence in
this manga.

Tama
